creditline: Gift of Juliann McGuire and Michael McGuire
description: predominantly rust colored with small stripes in purple, red, green, tan, yellow; several stripes have zigzag and scroll designs in white; ikat band at bottom on each side with zigzags, diamonds and letters (DACH?); green, red and white stitching at neck; striped trim; warp faced plain weave with complementary warp woven pattern bands and resist dye ikat patterning; heading band (?) sewn inside one side
title: Man's poncho
